segments.text: The kitchen looks ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight highlights the curtains tied back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's on full blast, sink full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That overflowing mess is just gross, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's apron will be ruined soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids raiding the cookie jarâ€”typical naughtiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed; it's unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's plate-holding hand makes him look comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's expectant face is almost pitiful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle on the floor will make everything slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies spilling might add to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside seems clean and inviting by comparison.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone turn off that water already!
segments.speaker: PAR
